class.name: DiscordClientCreateOptions
class.brief_description: Options for creating a new [DiscordClient] instance.
class.description: This class may be used to set advanced initialization-time options on [DiscordClient].

method.name: api_base
method.description: The base URL for the Discord API.

method.name: cpu_affinity_mask
method.description: CPU affinity mask hint for certain platforms. Depending on platform support, may or may not be ignored. Returns [int] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: experimental_android_prevent_comms_for_bluetooth
method.description: Whether to prevent communications mode on Android when Bluetooth is connected. This is an experimental API which may be removed or changed in a future release. When set to true, the SDK will not enter communications mode when Bluetooth is connected. This setting is only meaningful on Android. It allows you to retain full quality stereo audio playback when in-call and avoids mixing issues caused by Bluetooth Absolute Volume, but will use the device microphone instead of the headset one.

method.name: experimental_audio_system
method.description: The audio system to use. Defaults to [enum DiscordAudioSystem.STANDARD]. This is an experimental API which may be removed or changed in a future release. The game audio system alters the behavior of Discord Voice on mobile platforms to use standard media-type streams instead of voice-specific audio APIs when possible. Currently this will be used on iOS 18.2+ on devices which return true from [code]-[AVAudioSession isEchoCancelledInputAvailable][/code] and on Android devices.

method.name: set_cpu_affinity_mask
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordClientCreateOptions.cpu_affinity_mask]. Parameter [param cpu_affinity_mask] can be [int] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: web_base
method.description: The base URL for the Discord web application.
